message_1:
A company has four factories, and it wants to know if there is a difference in the average output between them. The daily production data (in thousands of units) for the 4 factories over a week is given below:

Factory 1: 15, 18, 20, 17, 19, 16, 18
Factory 2: 21, 23, 19, 20, 22, 23, 21
Factory 3: 17, 16, 18, 19, 20, 16, 18
Factory 4: 13, 15, 14, 16, 17, 16, 15

Using one-way ANOVA, determine whether there are any significant differences in the mean production levels of the four factories. Use an alpha level of 0.05.
message_2:
To perform a one-way ANOVA, we first need to calculate the means and variances for each factory, as well as the overall mean.

Factory 1:
Mean (M1) = (15+18+20+17+19+16+18)/7 = 17.57
Variance (V1) = [(15-17.57)^2 + (18-17.57)^2 + ... + (18-17.57)^2]/6 = 3.81

Factory 2:
Mean (M2) = (21+23+19+20+22+23+21)/7 = 21.29
Variance (V2) = [(21-21.29)^2 + (23-21.29)^2 + ... + (21-21.29)^2]/6 = 2.24

Factory 3:
Mean (M3) = (17+16+18+19+20+16+18)/7 = 17.71
Variance (V3) = [(17-17.71)^2 + (16-17.71)^2 + ... + (18-17.71)^2]/6 = 2.19

Factory 4:
Mean (M4) = (13+15+14+16+17+16+15)/7 = 15.14
Variance (V4) = [(13-15.14)^2 + (15-15.14)^2 + ... + (15-15.14)^2]/6 = 2.19

Overall Mean (M) = (17.57 + 21.29 + 17.71 + 15.14)/4 = 17.93

Now, we can calculate the between-group variance (MSG) and within-group variance (MSE).

MSG = [(17.57-17.93)^2 + (21.29-17.93)^2 + (17.71-17.93)^2 + (15.14-17.93)^2]/(4-1) = 30.47

MSE = (3.81 + 2.24 + 2.19 + 2.19)/(4*(7-1)) = 0.36

Now, we can calculate the F-statistic:

F = MSG/MSE = 30.47/0.36 = 84.64

Using an F-distribution table with degrees of freedom between groups (df1) = 4-1 = 3 and within groups (df2) = 4*(7-1) = 24, we can find the critical F-value for an alpha level of 0.05.

F_critical (0.05, 3, 24) â‰ˆ 3.01

Since F = 84.64 > F_critical = 3.01, we reject the null hypothesis that there is no significant difference in the mean production levels of the four factories. There is evidence to suggest that there are significant differences in the mean production levels of the factories at the 0.05 alpha level.
